ModMetaData.name: [CP] DOOM
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
"Warning, the Slayer has entered the colony."
Rip and tear your way into RimWorld with DOOM 2016 and DOOM Eternal weaponry. Raze hell while wearing the upgraded version of Slayer's Praetor Suit.
The only thing they fear is you.
Credits: Dninemfive - UAC Shield beltcoding id Software - DOOM 2016 and DOOM Eternal Mick Gordon - DOOM Soundtrack
